thread.title: Top things to do this weekend
thread.title_full: Top things to do this weekend

title: Top things to do this weekend
text:
Top things to do this weekend Caption Oct. 22: Ray Lewis book signing at Barnes and Noble Brynn Anderson, Associated Press 
The former Ravens linebacker will be at two places in the Baltimore area to sign copies of his autobiography, “I Feel Like Going On: Life, Game, and Glory." First, he'll be at the Inner Harbor Barnes & Noble at noon. Then he'll head to the Bel Air Barnes & Noble at 6 p.m. The store will issue wristbands starting at 7 a.m. at the Baltimore store, and 9 a.m. at the Bel Air store to those wanting the memoir signed. Find out more .

Find out more . (Brynn Anderson, Associated Press) Caption Oct. 22: Bell Biv Devoe at Rams Head Center Stage Patric Schneider, Associated Press 
The R&B group performs. Find out more . It will also perform F riday at Howard Theatre in Washington . (Patric Schneider, Associated Press)
